#summary outlines pysage API for sending messages

|| *Function* || *Local* || *IPC* || *Network* || *description* ||
||trigger||y||n||n||used to immediately process a message synchrounously||
||queue_message||y||n||n||puts the message on a queue.  Message will be processed next time "tick" is called||
||queue_message_to_group||n||y||n||immediately delivers the message to another pysage group via IPC.  It is up to the called group to process the message||
||send_message||n||n||y||immediately delivers the message to another pysage compatible node.  It's up to the called node to process the message||
